subject: Policy on issue of Policy Circulars.
text: HRaftu <cfly <oTrif gifaarut 3H1 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (agv 4ac7t 3 rrth +an4) G4H / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 #T National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) +1-5 W 6, #ier-10, ETGT;, 7 @orf _ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 2nd April, 2012 PQLICY MATERS-ADMNISTRATIONIFINANCE (Z7./2012) [Decision taken on File No NHALLL104108/2010-HRUL Sub: Policy on issue of Policy Circulars system of issue of numbered Policy Circular was evolved in NHAI in the year 2002 for dissemination and retrieval of important decisions   having far reaching consequences: Presently, the Policy Circulars with distinct numbers are issued under the following classification: Admn /Finance Technical 9 Voilaneecial Operation Road Safety 2 It has been observed that in the recent past Policy Circulars and other important circulars have been emanating from various divisions and officers without nodal control: This has often led to duplication, lack of coordination and retrieval. It has also led to the problem that full information on the subject is not readily available at one source_ To overcome and remove these difficulties, it has been decided that all Policy Circulars will be issued by Coordination Division as per following procedure: (a) The concerned Division will seek the approval of Chairman Executive Committee for the proposed Policy Circular: (b) After seeking approval, the concerned Division will forward the original file (along with approved draft Policy Circular) to the Coordination Division for its issue along with soft copy of the Policy Circular: (c) The Coordination Division will retain the copy of the relevant pages of note sheet, provide & distinct number to the Policy Circular and get it signed from CGM/ GM DGM of the Coordination Division: (d) Coordination Division will issue the Policy Circular through IT Division by e-mail (in PDF format) to all concerned along with a copy to Library: While circulating the Policy Circular the   subject and distinct number of the same will be mentioned in the subject of the e-mail:.
